items.sentence: No one was interested in anything I had to say.
I\'ll never forget how kind you\'ve been to me.
I don\'t understand what you are talking about.
I don\'t want to cause anyone any more trouble.
Tom doesn\'t think it will snow this afternoon.
Tom doesn\'t want Mary to say anything to John.
Tom doesn\'t want to do his homework right now.
What do you consider your greatest achievement?
If you don\'t want to talk to me, that\'s fine.
Do you have any idea where Tom might be hiding?
